content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Steam Power Generation at x=-9.5, y=-0.5 to x=1.5, y=6.5
This setup generates electricity using steam power.
Consists of the following entities:
*   Offshore Pump at position (x=-9.5, y=-0.5) extracting water.
*   Boiler at position (x=-5.0, y=2.5) heating water into steam (fueled with coal).
*   Steam Engine at position (x=1.5, y=6.5) consuming steam to generate power.
*   PipeGroup connecting the Offshore Pump to the Boiler (fluid=water, position=x=-8.5 y=-0.5).
*   PipeGroup connecting the Boiler to the Steam Engine (fluid=steam, position=x=-3.5 y=2.5).

### Crude Oil Extraction and Storage at x=17.5, y=40.5 to x=19.5, y=45.5
This setup extracts crude oil and stores it. It is powered by the steam power generation setup.
Consists of the following entities:
*   Pumpjack at position (x=17.5, y=40.5) extracting crude oil.
*   Storage Tank at position (x=19.5, y=45.5) storing the extracted crude oil.
*   PipeGroup connecting the Pumpjack output to the Storage Tank input (fluid=crude-oil, position=x=17.5 y=43.5).
*   ElectricityGroup connecting the Steam Engine to the Pumpjack via Small Electric Poles (id=5391, poles starting from x=1.5, y=8.5 extending towards the pumpjack).

### Basic Oil Processing Setup at x=34
